PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SystemFurnitureElementTypePanel
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: A set of specific properties for vertical panels that assembly workstations.. HISTORY: First issued in IFC Release R1.5. Renamed from Pset_Panel

PropertyDef.Name: HasOpening
PropertyDef.Definition: indicates whether the panel has an opening (= TRUE) or not (= FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: FurniturePanelType
PropertyDef.Definition: Available panel types from which that required may be selected.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal thickness of the panel
